name: Apotheosis Heroes
description:
In the battles of ancient Apotheosis, we will bring you into the drastic ancient battlefield to experience the unique battle journey, by using the various artifacts to realize the great honor.

----Game Features----

【Hang-on Operation】
Avoid the complicated operations, easily level up automatically even 24H offline

【General Recruitment】
Hundreds of Generals all available for you to choose, accompany you to be the superhero in the battleground.

【Free Attributes Selection】
Various attributes and addition system of Generals

【Reinforce each other】
Win or Lose depends on your generals’ location placing and fate cultivation.

【Evil Battle】
Strategically match the generals in array could bring you to success

【Devildom Leader】
By retaining the traditional fight of gameplay, add BOSS elements into it, and also the offline register function, which players can participate activities and get rewards even offline.
